sn48.64:1.1: “Mendicants, when these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to the ending of defilements.
sn48.64:1.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
sn48.64:1.4: When these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to the ending of defilements.”
sn48.64:2.1: “Mendicants, when these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to giving up the fetters, uprooting the underlying tendencies, completely understanding the course of time, and ending the defilements.
sn48.64:2.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
sn48.64:2.4: When these five faculties are developed and cultivated they lead to giving up the fetters, uprooting the underlying tendencies, completely understanding the course of time, and ending the defilements.”
